Package
Description
net.dapete.exceptional
This package provides utilities for handling checked exceptions in functional interfaces.
net.dapete.exceptional.stream
This package provides utilities for handling checked exceptions in Streams.

    @NonNull DoubleBinaryOperator
    ExceptionalWrapper.wrap(@NonNull ExceptionalDoubleBinaryOperator<E> binaryOperator)
